401.description: Token is invalid or already logged out

post.summary: Send a message to GPT specialized in home appliance repair
post.description: Sends a user message to the GPT API and saves the conversation if the user is authenticated. GPT responds only about home appliance repairs.

message.example: My washing machine won't start. What should I check?

ai_message.example: Check the door latch and power supply...

message.example: How can I fix my dishwasher?

post.summary: Create a new chat history entry

message.example: How can I fix my dishwasher?

get.summary: Get a specific chat history entry

message.example: How can I fix my dishwasher?

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the topic to update

description.example: Updated guide for common refrigerator issues

image.description: Optional. New image for the topic

message.example: I need help with my appliance
I need help with my appliance
I need help with my appliance
